body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. play Rakdos Cluestone
2. cast a spell using mana from Rakdos Cluestone, having both a spare red and a black mana left 
3. use the ability (draw a card) while Rakdos Cluestone is tapped What is the expected output? What do you see instead? it shouldn't be possible to use this ability while Rakdos Cluestone is tapped What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Linux Mint 16, magarena 1.48.827 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Rakdos Cluestone: {B}{R}{T}, Sacrifice Rakdos Cluestone: Draw a card -> ability can be used even if Rakdos Cluestone is tapped

comments.body: Good find - thanks for that. All the cluestones were missing the Tap for their second ability. Fix submitted.
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
